# commvault_kubernetes_applications (Data Source)


## Example Usage


```hcl
data "commvault_kubernetes_applications" "kubernetes_applications" {
  name      = "my-pod"
  clusterid = 4050
  namespace = "default"
}
```

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
